Articles.Content:
Here is my replica of the Mikoyan Gurevich MiG-31 "Foxhound" 

66 Parts, 15~ tons, 370-380 m/s at sea level

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/XK8Jd)

[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/oqwm29uzr4h08x5/MiG%20Foxhound.craft?dl=0)

**Bonus MiG-25 Foxbat**

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/IxDz8)

[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/u9wyyps0uojc1x1/MiG%20Foxbat-S.craft?dl=0)

**Modded version (uses** [**BDArmory**](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/90/BahamutoDs%20Armory) **and** [**BD Dynamics**](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/101/Bahamuto_Dynamics_Parts_pack_v1.1)**)**

MiG-31 Stand-off Interceptor (Air-to-Air)

[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/t58a9dl2pqw5ls1/MiG%20Foxhound%20%28BD%20A-A%29.craft?dl=0)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-28T05:58:32Z" title="08/28/2015 05:58  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 28, 2015</time> by Yaeah**
Post has been updated with MiG-25
Zekes should look at these to see what can be done without using 500+ parts/ship, nice job!

Both planes have been upgraded with a more powerful engine system, allowing the high speed and high acceleration characterized by their real life counterparts. Enjoy!

Edit: Mig-25 Has been given a slight aesthetic upgrade
